title: The Lost Article That Smells Like a Case

infobox.Title:: The Lost Article That Smells Like a Case
infobox.Japanese title:: 落とし物は事件のにおい  (Otoshimono wa Jiken no Nioi)
infobox.English title:: The Lost Article That Smells Like a Case
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Detective Boys  Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi  Keita Kaneko
infobox.Character design:: Masatomo Sudo  Rei Masunaga (sub-character)  Hiroshi Ogawa (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Yukiko Iwai as Ayumi Yoshida  Wataru Takagi as Genta Kojima  Ikue Otani as Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya  Ryoko Shiraishi as Risa Yamaki  Hiro Shimono as Keita Yagi  Kosuke Goto as Yutaka Oi  Fuko Shinomiya as Shizu Kanno  Sho Okumura as Shop clerk  Masumi Tazawa as Girl

sections.Situation:
Ayumi found a bracelet at the park. Conan then notice tire tracks and bloodstains in front of the park.

They then found the owner, Shinobu Yamaki. However, when they arrive at his house, they are greeted by his sister, Risa Yamaki. They return the bracelet to Risa.
Conan decide to follow Risa, and found out that Risa could not contact her brother for a week. She visits her brother's friend, Yutaka Oi, who says that Shinobu might meet Yagi or Kogure.
Conan later is discovered by Detective Boys following Risa, thus losing her. They decide to split up looking for Risa.
Risa then visit Keita Yagi. After hearing about Shinobu disappearance's and the bracelet, Yagi decide to help her.
The Detective Boys later manage to find Yagi's apartment and ask if Risa visited him, but he admit that he did not meet anyone that day. Meanwhile, Risa is being tied on the sofa.
sections.People:
- Victim (kidnapped)
- 25 years old
- Shinobu's younger sister
- Missing
- Risa's older brother
- 28 years old
- Shinobu's friend
- 25 years old
- Shinobu's friend
- 65 years old
- Retiree
- Jewerly worker
- Jewerly employee
- Asks the Detective Boys for a favor
- Shinobu's friend
sections.Resolution:
Yagi tells Risa that he used Shinobu's money for investment, but he lost it all. Shinobu was furious and insisted Yagi to return the money or otherwise he woud report the police and tell his fiancée. Hearing that, Yagi murdered Shinobu. He then plans to murder Risa too.

The Detective Boys decide to save Risa by themselves. However, their voices were heard by Yagi, so he decides to kill them.

Fortunately, Conan manages to save them in time.
In the afternoon, the Detective Boys are asked by a girl whether they drop the watch or not. The Detective Boys look cheerful as a new case for them, with Conan thinking they don't have any lesson from the previous case.
sections.Trivia:
- Kaneko Jewelry Store and its owner, Café Haronbo, and Ogino Produce Store from The Case of Ayumi's Illustrated Diary reappear in this episode.
- Risa's birth month is revealed to be January through the fact that Shinobu's bracelet has Risa's birthstone on it, the garnet.
- Shinobu Yamaki is shown to be wearing a sweater with his initial, the letter "Y".
